//Problem 4: Ramesh Room problem
// Codechef peer problem

#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main(){

	unsigned int t,rl,rb,tl,tb;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>rl>>rb>>tl>>tb;
		unsigned long long roomArea = rl*rb;
		unsigned long long tileArea = tl*tb;
		if(roomArea % tileArea == 0)
			cout<<"yes"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"no"<<endl;
	}
	//system("PAUSE");
	return 0;
}
